Big update ahead!

- New female sword and shield gladiator with unique dash skills. She is an agressive gladiator that unlocks at Headquarters level 14.
- New season event: Halloween. The city is celebrating Halloween! Check out the new buildings. Spin the Prize Wheel and earn keys to open special Halloween chests with unique legendary Halloween gear. Don't forget to battle against the new skeleton gladiators!

Gameplay changes:
- Changed how the rank of a new gladiator is calculated so it is easier to achieve high ranks in multiplayer.
- Now the rewards from an in app purchase in the city and the world map are delivered through a gift chest.
- More feedback on single player event windows when the event is finished.

Fixes
- Fixed the Armor Increase skill that was doing the opposite effect after the first use.
- Fixed the Armor Break skill that was doing the opposite effect after the first use.
- Improved the speed and stability of server synchronization.
- Fixed a rare freeze-up that could occur in the Merchant screen when opening a chest.
- Fixed a crash when opening a chest in the Merchant Window.
- Now in the forge window if the user locks an item it will be refreshed properly after returning to the item selection window.
- Vip player status now appears in the UI immediately after the purchase has been completed.
- Improved the AI of Jump & Damage attacks. The gladiator will now leap to the position that will cause damage to the largest number of enemies.
- Fixed the stats and rarities of some necklaces.

The arena is full, the crowd is roaring, and the next big Gladiator Heroes update is armed and ready for combat! Take a break from battle to check out the new additions and improvements in this update:

Features:
- Clan Orb Donations: Clan members can now help each other by donating their surplus Orbs. These “donated” orbs will grant temporary bonuses to the clan member that receives them!.
- Clan Building can now reach level 5, which will increase the amount of donated Orbs it can store.
- Players will now be able to “visit” other players’ cities, and check their gladiators.
- New premium statue! This new statue will always grant you a 5-star gladiator carrying high quality equipment.
- New “re-roll” button in the hiring window. If you don’t like the gladiator you just opened, you can discard it and pay half the statue’s price to get a new gladiator.

Fixes:
- Fixed the “Give Orders" skill, preventing an issue when giving two orders in fast succession.
- Fixed a bug in the “Dash” skills of the female Sword & Shield gladiator, which sometimes caused the ongoing match to stop.
- Fixed a problem with the Fame in Multiplayer matches.
- Fixed “Joined a clan” message not being displayed.
- Fixed text color when the system on-screen keyboard was opened.

Tweaks:
- Improved Clan chat UI.
- Added grey bar to the gladiator’s healthbar when they enter combat without being fully healed.
- Rebalanced difficulty for weekly Events. Now, more players should be able to enjoy these Events.
- You can now view the Clan details if you click on their position in the Leaderboard.
- High rank/level items will no longer require more gold to be forged than what you can store in your Gold Warehouses.

We continue working to improve Gladiator Heroes Clash!
Features:
- Increased in-game measures against cheaters.
- New Weekend Event type! A new kind of Event will be offered from time to time, featuring better rewards, but with an increase in difficulty and limited attempts.

Fixes:
- Fixed a bug that could cause a higher or lower rank being shown when hiring a gladiator.
- Fixed Thor having an incorrect level in his passive skills when hired at high ranks.
- Fixed the need for double clicking when trying to activate the VIP subscription.
- Fixed a bug in multiplayer matches where sending the app to background during the multichest screen could cause said screen to disappear when re-opening the game (losing those rewards).
- Fixed a bug that could cause the completion achievement for Path #1 to be impossible to complete.
- Fixed a possible block during the "cloud" loading screen that could happen if the player tried to access the World Map with the "Ask for notifications" popup active.
- Fixed a bug in the "Hook and hit" and the "Hook" skills, that could cause the AI to use them in useless scenarios.
- Fixed some crashes related to interface animations.
- Fixed a possible game block that caused the Silver Statue tutorial and the Merchant to trigger at the same time.
- Fixed a possible game block that cause the Infirmary tutorial to advance in the game.
- Fixed rare block in the World Map that prevented the player from accessing new campaign missions.
- Fixed bug that could break the customization system if the gladiator being customized had one of a few rare weapons equipped.
- Fixed wrong Dual gladiator rotation animation in the hiring window.
- Fixed performance hiccups when gladiators were killed.
- Fixed a bug for AoE skills that was affecting "Battle Banner", "Defensive Aura" and "Fear". Stat modifiers are now applied correctly.
- Fixed the customer support button not appearing right after launching the game.

Tweaks:
- If a player is in a situation where they could obtain items from two different ranks, it will be shown in the Event prize information window.

Enjoy! ;)
